entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge is described as the Minister of Magic and a portly man who often sports a lime-green bowler hat. He is mentioned to have dispensed with his indulgent smile when speaking to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the person being judged by Cornelius Fudge and the people seated at the bench above. He looks up at them feeling rather sick.

entities.name: minister of magic
entities.description: The position of Minister of Magic is mentioned to be held by Cornelius Fudge.

relationships.description: Cornelius Fudge and the people seated at the bench above are judging Harry, as indicated by their stern expressions and looks of curiosity.
